#summary Roles and Capabilities of different usertypes
#labels UserSupport,users,roles

= Introduction =

There are three user types:
- anonymous
- user
- administrator


= Details =
<br/>
What 'anonymous' users can do:<br/>
- read only access to all the data of a projecttree (they have access rights to)
<br/>
What 'user' users can do:<br>
- to be documented<br/>
<br/>
What 'administrator' users can do:
- everything<br/>
